mapper.insert: INSERT INTO study_t(stname, maxPcnt, stype, typeFk, typeName, sgroup, content, captain) VALUES ( #{stname}, #{maxPcnt}, #{stype}, #{typeFk}, #{typeName}, #{sgroup}, #{content}, #{captain} )
mapper.select: SELECT stid FROM study_t WHERE stname = #{stname} AND captain = #{captain} ORDER BY stid DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT stid, stname, maxPcnt, pcnt, stype, typeFk, typeName, sgroup, content, captain FROM study_t WHERE stype = 2 AND typeFk = #{cid}
SELECT stid, stname, maxPcnt, pcnt, stype, typeFk, typeName, sgroup, content, captain FROM study_t WHERE stype = 1 AND typeFk = #{wid}
